wikipedia_page.main: Shereen El Feki (Arabic: شيرين الفقي; born 1967 or 1968) is a British journalist and author, most notable for her book Sex and the Citadel: Intimate Life in a Changing Arab World.

response: *Shereen El Feki, Sex and the Citadel
*People & Power – a biweekly programme, originally presented by Dr. Shereen El Feki.

Women Deliver Conference 2013, Presidential Session: Ending Violence Against Women, Kualalumpur, Malaysia (May 29, 2013) (Moderated by Shereen El Feki with Gary Barker, Lakshmi Puri, Princess Mabel of Orange-Nassau)

The programme originally had a presenter. It was hosted by Shereen El Feki  but she was replaced by a new presenter, Samah El-Shahat, a development economist, in March 2007. Juliana Ruhfus was the programme’s main reporter and occasional presenter.  Her film on the ex-combatants in Liberia launched the programme the day Al Jazeera went on air.
